description:
When using nova-manage, the default error message is

"An Error has ocurred, please consult the logs for more information"

There's quite a number of times that this leads to another one line error line in the logs, I think it would be very useful and experience enrichening to be able to have a one line error to give you a hint and then you can consult the log for more detailed information.
title: nova-manage should have more useful one liner errors

comments.content:
It looks like there has been good progres over the last 9 months on making errors from nova-manage more useful. Certainly the dreaded "please consult the logs" phrase is no longer anywhere in the code base.

On this basis, I am marking this bug as 'fix released' - please feel free to reopen if you're still unhappy with the errors from nova-manage.
